shopify.newArchitectureDescription: Orders are now imported first from Shopify and then matched with the carrier by customer name. This ensures we have all order data, even data that is not in the carrier.
shopify.step1Description: Go to Admin â†’ Apps â†’ Manage private apps â†’ Create private app
shopify.step2Description: Enable: Read access for Orders, Products, Customers and Inventory
shopify.step3Description: Copy the automatically generated "Admin API access token"
shopify.syncFlowStep2: 2. Match with carrier by customer name
shopify.webhookDescription: For real-time synchronization, configure the webhook in your Shopify account before filling in the credentials below.

shopify.readyToSyncDescription: You can now import your orders.

settings.title: System Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize and configure your preferences
settings.timezoneDescription: This timezone will be used to calculate dashboard metrics and reports
settings.currencyDescription: Currency in which values will be displayed on the dashboard
settings.languageDescription: Language used in welcome emails and automatic communications
settings.orderPrefixPlaceholder: Ex: 52, BG, CR (# will be added automatically)
settings.orderPrefixDescription: Enter the 3 characters of the prefix (# is added automatically). Ex: 52 becomes #52, BG becomes #BG
settings.tourDescription: The guided tour shows the main system features, including metrics, integrations and ads. Perfect for new users or to remember features.

newOperation.title: Create New Operation
newOperation.nameRequiredDescription: Please enter a name for the operation.
newOperation.selectionsRequiredDescription: Please select the country and currency.

dashboard.welcomeDescription: Let's take a quick tour of the main indicators and features of the platform. This tour has 14 steps and takes about 3 minutes.
dashboard.operationSelectorStep1: The first step is to create your Digital Business Operation!
dashboard.operationSelectorStep2: An operation represents a specific business or brand. You can have multiple operations (e.g., different stores, countries or brands) and switch between them easily.
dashboard.operationSelectorStep3: Use the "Create Operation" button below to get started.
dashboard.platformRevenueDescription: This card shows the total revenue and number of orders imported from your sales platform (Shopify/CartPanda). This is the gross value before deducting costs.
dashboard.cpaMarketingDescription: Here you see the cost per acquisition (CPA) of ads and total marketing spend. Helps you understand how much you invest to get each order.
dashboard.n1OrdersDescription: Total orders confirmed by the warehouse and delivered to the customer. Shows how many orders were processed and completed successfully.
dashboard.returnedCostsDescription: Total value of costs for orders that were returned or cancelled. Important for calculating losses from returns.
dashboard.shippingCostsDescription: Total spent on shipping and freight for orders. One of the main operational expenses of the business.
dashboard.productCostsDescription: Total value spent on products sold (acquisition cost). Essential for calculating gross profit margin.
dashboard.paidRevenueDescription: Value actually received for orders that were delivered. This is the real money that came into the cash register, different from gross revenue.
dashboard.deliveryRateDescription: Percentage of orders that were successfully delivered relative to the total. The higher, the better your logistics operation and customer satisfaction.
dashboard.realCPADescription: Real cost per acquisition calculated based on orders actually delivered. More accurate metric than ad CPA, as it only considers completed sales.
dashboard.totalProfitDescription: The final net profit after deducting ALL costs (products, shipping, marketing, returns). This is the most important indicator of your business's financial health!

integrations.platformIntegrationDescription: Connect your Shopify or CartPanda store to automatically sync orders. This is the essential first step to start using the platform!

ads.manageCampaignsDescription: Connect your Facebook Ads accounts to track campaign performance and optimize your ads directly on the platform.
ads.completedDescription: You now know all the main indicators and features of the N1 Dashboard. You're ready to start managing your business professionally!
ads.completedFooter: You can retake this tour anytime in settings.

sync.importOrdersDescription: Now that you've configured your platform and warehouse, click Complete Sync to import all your orders.
sync.importOrdersDescription2: This synchronization will bring data from your platform (Shopify/CartPanda) and warehouse, allowing you to manage everything in one place.
sync.importOrdersFooter: It may take a few minutes depending on the number of orders.

toast.completedDescription: You can retake the tour anytime in settings.

landing.heroTitle:
Sell your physical products in Europe
without bureaucracy
landing.heroSubtitle: Complete structure for diverse physical products and nutraceuticals. Fiscal, legal, regulatory and logistics â€” everything solved so you can focus on what matters: your sales.
landing.statsSubtitle: Consolidated infrastructure and proven results in the European market
landing.problemTitle: Selling in Europe should be simple...
landing.problemSubtitle: But you know how many complex barriers exist

regulatory.title: Regulatory Complexity
regulatory.desc: Especially for nutraceuticals: health registrations, EFSA compliance, country-specific labeling

fiscal.title: Fragmented Fiscal Structure
fiscal.desc: 28 countries, 28 different tax systems. VAT, EORI, mandatory fiscal representation

logistics.title: International Logistics
logistics.desc: Customs, local warehousing, returns management, long lead times and unpredictable costs

legal.title: Legal Compliance
legal.desc: GDPR, consumer rights, local refund policies, specific terms of use

support.title: Multilingual Support
support.desc: Support in 28+ languages, local knowledge, management of different time zones

risk.title: Operational Risk
risk.desc: Zero predictability, unstable cash flow, exposure to regulatory changes

landing.problemResult: The result? Months of planning, thousands in consulting and risk of non-compliance.
landing.problemResultDesc: 95% of Brazilian companies that try to enter Europe on their own abandon the project or operate outside legal compliance â€” exposing themselves to fines of up to â‚¬20 million.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Simple and transparent process to bring your products to Europe

step1.title: Analysis & Consulting
step1.description: Free strategic session. We analyze your products, target market and define the complete roadmap for Europe.

step2.title: Regulatory Setup
step2.description: Our team takes care of all approvals, health registrations, fiscal structure and compliance in all European countries.

step3.title: Launch & Scale
step3.description: You focus on marketing and sales while we operate the entire infrastructure. Frictionless growth from 0 to â‚¬10M+.

testimonial1.name: Carlos Mendes
testimonial1.content: In 3 months we were already selling in 12 European countries. N1 took care of all the regulatory complexity of our nutraceuticals.

testimonial2.name: Ana Silva
testimonial2.content: We tried for 1 year to enter Europe on our own. With N1, in 45 days we had our first sale. Complete and professional structure.

fiscal.title: Complete Fiscal Structure
fiscal.description: Fiscal and legal management in all European countries. You don't need to open a company or deal with paperwork.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Compliance

landing.ctaSubtitle: 100% free strategic session with our specialists. Leave the meeting with a complete roadmap for the European market.

ctaBenefits.roadmap: Roadmap for entering the European market

landing.ctaLimited: âš¡ Only 5 slots available this week - Limited schedule

faq.q1: How much does it cost to use N1's structure?
faq.a1: Our plans start from â‚¬2,500/month with variable performance fee. Includes complete fiscal, legal, logistics and compliance structure. No hidden costs or surprises.
faq.q2: What types of products does N1 work with?
faq.a2: We specialize in diverse physical products and nutraceuticals. Our regulatory expertise covers everything from dietary supplements to general consumer products, always ensuring total compliance.
faq.q3: How do you handle nutraceutical regulations?
faq.a3: We have dedicated specialists in European nutraceutical regulations. We take care of all necessary approvals, health registrations, EFSA compliance and conformity with specific norms of each country.
faq.q4: What is the typical timeframe to start selling?
faq.a4: General physical products: 7-14 days. Nutraceuticals: 21-30 days due to specific regulatory approvals. Complex products: up to 45 days. The entire process is transparent with weekly updates.
faq.q5: Do I need to worry about fiscal issues in Europe?
faq.a5: Absolutely not. Our fiscal structure is established in all countries where we operate. You sell from Brazil and we take care of all fiscal, legal and European compliance management.

footer.description: Specialists in complete structure for sales of physical products and nutraceuticals in Europe. Compliance, logistics and operation without bureaucracy.
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 N1 Global Solutions. All rights reserved.
